description: Source code implementing CRUD operations for the Note model, including functions to get, list, create, update, and delete notes, using SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: Optional[models.Note] get_note(db: Session, note_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieve a single note by its ID.

methods.name: Sequence[models.Note] list_notes(db: Session, q: Optional[str] = None, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100)
methods.description: List notes with optional search filtering, supporting pagination.

methods.name: models.Note create_note(db: Session, data: NoteCreate)
methods.description: Create a new note record in the database.

methods.name: Optional[models.Note] update_note(db: Session, note_id: int, data: NoteUpdate)
methods.description: Update an existing note with provided data, returning the updated record.

methods.name: bool delete_note(db: Session, note_id: int)
methods.description: Delete a note by ID, returning success status.

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.pattern: /^def list_notes(db: Session, q: Optional[str] = None, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100) -> Sequenc/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, q: Optional[str] = None, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100)

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(db: Session, note_id: int, data: NoteUpdate) -> Optional[models.Note]:$/
